name: Kris Harbold
body:
## About Me
I’m a senior computer engineering major at The George Washington University. My interests span from machine learning and data science, to economics and history.  I’m a huge statistics nerd. I also happen to love biking, sailing, and baseball (go Mariners).

Most recently I worked as a data science intern at Bitly.  There I worked to bring more meaning and understanding to bitly data, for both the company and it's users, through projects like the [Read-Time Media Map](http://luvit.me/1fLMtq3).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
